wikipedia_page.main: Thomas James C. Baxter (born 1893) was an English professional footballer of the 1920s. Born in Wandsworth, he joined Gillingham from Chelsea in 1920 and went on to make 19 appearances for the club in The Football League.

response: Thomas or Tom Baxter may refer to:
*Tom Baxter (footballer, born 1893) (1893–?), English footballer who played for Chelsea and Gillingham
*Tom Baxter (footballer, born 1903) (1903–1987), English footballer who played for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Port Vale
